verses.text: بِّسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ إِنَّآ أَنزَلْنَٰهُ فِى لَيْلَةِ ٱلْقَدْرِ
verses.translation_en: Indeed, We sent the Qur'an down during the Night of Decree.
verses.translation_zh: 我在那高贵的夜间确已降示它,

verses.translation_en: And what can make you know what is the Night of Decree?
verses.translation_zh: 你怎能知道那高贵的夜间是什麽？

verses.text: لَيْلَةُ ٱلْقَدْرِ خَيْرٌ مِّنْ أَلْفِ شَهْرٍ
verses.translation_en: The Night of Decree is better than a thousand months.
verses.translation_zh: 那高贵的夜间, 胜过一千个月,

verses.text: تَنَزَّلُ ٱلْمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ وَٱلرُّوحُ فِيهَا بِإِذْنِ رَبِّهِم مِّن كُلِّ أَمْرٍ
verses.translation_en: The angels and the Spirit descend therein by permission of their Lord for every matter.
verses.translation_zh: 众天神和精神, 奉他们的主的命令, 为一切事务而在那夜间降临,

verses.translation_en: Peace it is until the emergence of dawn.
verses.translation_zh: 那夜间全是平安的, 直到黎明显著的时侯。
